title: Analyze a valid response sheet URL and view full results (English)
description: Verifies that a user can select exam category/type and language, submit a valid response sheet URL, see a loading state, and land on a results view with key scorecard sections visible.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown
Paste response sheet URL in input field

title: Analyze a valid response sheet URL and view bilingual/translated content (Hindi)
description: Verifies that selecting Hindi language and analyzing shows a results view with Hindi-visible content for the scorecard.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown
Paste response sheet URL in input field

title: Validation: Attempt analyze without providing a URL
description: Verifies that clicking Analyze with an empty URL input does not proceed and shows a visible validation/error message.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown

title: Validation: Attempt analyze without selecting exam category/type
description: Verifies that analysis cannot start when exam selections are missing and a visible prompt/error is shown.

steps.description: Paste response sheet URL in input field

title: Error handling: Malformed URL shows parse/network error with retry option
description: Verifies that submitting a malformed URL leads to an error state and a visible retry option is shown.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown
Paste "not-a-url" into response sheet URL in input field

title: Error handling: Inaccessible URL shows network/CORS error with retry option
description: Verifies that submitting an unreachable URL results in a visible network/CORS error message and a retry option.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown
Paste "https://example.invalid/response.html" into response sheet URL in input field

title: Retry flow: After an error, retry succeeds and results render
description: Verifies that using the retry option after an analysis error re-attempts analysis and can reach a results view.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown
Paste "not-a-url" into response sheet URL in input field

title: Change selections: Switching exam category updates available exam types before analyze
description: Verifies that changing the exam category affects the specific exam type selection and the form remains usable for analysis.

steps.description: Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Select specific exam type from dropdown
Select exam category from dropdown (SSC, Railway, IB, Bank, Police)
Verify element "Select specific exam type" is visible
Select specific exam type from dropdown

title: View candidate information card after successful analysis
description: Verifies the candidate information card is visible on the results view after analysis completes.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Verify element "Candidate information card" is visible

title: View total score summary card after successful analysis
description: Verifies the total score summary is shown on the results view after analysis completes.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Verify element "Total score summary card" is visible

title: View section-wise breakdown table on results
description: Verifies the section-wise breakdown table is visible after analysis completes.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Verify element "Section-wise breakdown table" is visible

title: Browse questions by switching section tabs
description: Verifies users can browse question analysis by switching between section tabs.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on a section tab in the questions area
Click on a different section tab in the questions area

title: Filter questions to show only Correct status
description: Verifies filtering by the Correct status updates the visible question list.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on the status filter for "Correct"
Verify element "Filtered question list" is visible

title: Filter questions to show only Wrong status
description: Verifies filtering by the Wrong status updates the visible question list.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on the status filter for "Wrong"
Verify element "Filtered question list" is visible

title: Filter questions to show only Unattempted status
description: Verifies filtering by the Unattempted status updates the visible question list.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on the status filter for "Unattempted"
Verify element "Filtered question list" is visible

title: Filter questions to show only Bonus status
description: Verifies filtering by the Bonus status updates the visible question list.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on the status filter for "Bonus"
Verify element "Filtered question list" is visible

title: Toggle language between English and Hindi for questions
description: Verifies the language toggle changes the displayed question language on the results view.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on the language toggle to switch to Hindi
Click on the language toggle to switch to English

title: Hindi variant missing: fallback language and unavailable notice shown
description: Verifies that when Hindi content is unavailable for some questions, the UI falls back to the available language and shows an unavailable-variant notice.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field that is known to contain at least one question with missing Hindi variant
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Click on the language toggle to switch to Hindi

title: Return from results to input form using Back button
description: Verifies the Back button returns the user from the results view to the input form on the main page.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select a valid exam configuration option from the exam type dropdown
Verify element "response sheet URL input field" is visible

title: Select SSC CGL Tier-I exam type and analyze response sheet URL successfully
description: Verifies that selecting a specific exam type (SSC CGL Tier-I) is applied when analyzing a response sheet URL and results are shown.

steps.description: Select "SSC" from the exam category dropdown
Select "SSC CGL Tier-I" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field
Verify text "SSC CGL Tier-I" is visible

title: Switch exam type before analyze and confirm the latest selection is used
description: Verifies that changing the exam type selection before clicking Analyze uses the most recent exam config selection.

steps.description: Select "SSC" from the exam category dropdown
Select "SSC CHSL" from the supported exam types list
Select "SSC CGL Tier-I" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1" into the response sheet URL field
Verify text "SSC CGL Tier-I" is visible

title: Select a Railway exam type (RRB NTPC) and analyze
description: Verifies that a Railway exam type can be selected and the app proceeds to compute and display results for that selection.

steps.description: Select "Railway" from the exam category dropdown
Select "RRB NTPC" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Select an IB exam type (ACIO) and analyze
description: Verifies that an IB exam type can be selected and results are generated with that config applied.

steps.description: Select "IB" from the exam category dropdown
Select "ACIO" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1" into the response sheet URL field

title: Select a Bank exam type (IBPS PO) and analyze
description: Verifies that a Bank exam type can be selected and the resulting view reflects the selected exam type.

steps.description: Select "Bank" from the exam category dropdown
Select "IBPS PO" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Select a Police exam type (Delhi Police Constable) and analyze
description: Verifies that a Police exam type can be selected and analysis proceeds to a results view reflecting that selection.

steps.description: Select "Police" from the exam category dropdown
Select "Delhi Police Constable" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1" into the response sheet URL field
Verify text "Delhi Police Constable" is visible

title: Attempt analyze without selecting an exam type shows instruction to manually select
description: Verifies that if the user does not select a specific exam type and tries to analyze, the UI presents an instruction to manually choose the exam type.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Select an incorrect exam type and verify parsing warning / incorrect mapping message is shown
description: Verifies that using a mismatched exam configuration triggers a visible warning or message instructing the user to manually select the correct exam type.

steps.description: Select "SSC" from the exam category dropdown
Select "SSC Steno" from the supported exam types list
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Switch language from English to Hindi and see question content update
description: Verifies the language toggle switches the question display to Hindi after analysis.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi

title: Switch language from Hindi back to English and see question content update
description: Verifies the language toggle switches back to English after viewing Hindi.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi
Click on the language toggle button to switch back to English

title: In English mode, prefer question image variant when available
description: Verifies that when a question image exists for the selected language, it is shown in English mode.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on a question in the analysis list to open its detail view

title: In Hindi mode, prefer question image variant when available
description: Verifies that when a Hindi question image exists, it is shown after switching to Hindi.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on a question in the analysis list to open its detail view
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi

title: Switch language and see option images update to selected language
description: Verifies option images (or option content) reflect the currently selected language.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on a question in the analysis list to open its detail view
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi

title: Hindi variant missing for some images shows fallback content and warning
description: Verifies missing Hindi variant triggers a visible unavailable-variant warning and shows fallback image/text instead of breaking the UI.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field that is known to include at least one question/option without a Hindi image variant
Click on a question in the analysis list to open its detail view
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi

title: Toggling language does not remove candidate analysis context
description: Verifies the language toggle changes only the bilingual display and does not reset the analysis results view.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi

title: Rapid language toggling remains stable and keeps selected language state
description: Verifies quickly toggling languages does not break the question display and ends in the expected language.

steps.description: Select an exam type from the exam configuration dropdown
Type a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL field
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi
Click on the language toggle button to switch back to English
Click on the language toggle button to switch to Hindi

title: Analyze a valid ViewCandResponse URL and display parsed scorecard results
description: Verifies that a valid ViewCandResponse response-sheet URL can be analyzed and results are shown on the page.

steps.description: Type a valid ViewCandResponse.aspx response-sheet URL into the URL input field

title: Analyze a valid AssessmentQPHTMLMode1 URL and display parsed question details
description: Verifies that a valid AssessmentQPHTMLMode1 response-sheet URL can be analyzed and question/answer details appear.

steps.description: Type a valid AssessmentQPHTMLMode1 response-sheet URL into the URL input field

title: Validation: Attempt analyze with empty URL shows an error message
description: Verifies the UI prevents submission without a URL and shows a visible validation message.

title: Validation: Invalid/non-HTTP text in URL field shows a visible error
description: Verifies that clearly invalid input is rejected or results in a visible parse/fetch error message.

steps.description: Type "not a url" into the URL input field

title: Format detection: Submit ViewCandResponse URL and confirm results load without manual format selection
description: Verifies the system auto-detects the HTML format and still produces results after submission.

steps.description: Type a valid ViewCandResponse.aspx response-sheet URL into the URL input field

title: Results content: Verify a question shows both selected answer and correct answer labels
description: Verifies that parsed output distinguishes the candidate’s selected option from the correct option in the UI.

steps.description: Type a valid AssessmentQPHTMLMode1 response-sheet URL into the URL input field

title: Bonus question marking: Verify bonus question indicator appears in results (if present in the sheet)
description: Verifies that when the response sheet includes a bonus question, the UI displays a visible bonus indicator.

steps.description: Type a response-sheet URL known to include at least one bonus question into the URL input field

title: Download Answer Key in English from analyzed result
description: Verifies that an analyzed response sheet can generate an English Answer Key download via the download language dialog.
category: Download Features (Response Sheet / Answer Key / Quiz Mode)

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration option from the exam type/config dropdown
Click the Analyze or Generate Scorecard button
Click the Download button for "Answer Key"

title: Download Response Sheet in Hindi from analyzed result
description: Verifies that an analyzed response sheet can generate a Hindi Response Sheet download via the download language dialog.
category: Download Features (Response Sheet / Answer Key / Quiz Mode)

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration option from the exam type/config dropdown
Click the Analyze or Generate Scorecard button
Click the Download button for "Response Sheet"

title: Download Quiz Mode in Bilingual from analyzed result
description: Verifies that an analyzed response sheet can generate a Bilingual Quiz Mode HTML download via the download language dialog.
category: Download Features (Response Sheet / Answer Key / Quiz Mode)

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration option from the exam type/config dropdown
Click the Analyze or Generate Scorecard button
Click the Download button for "Quiz Mode"

title: Download dialog supports switching language selection before generating
description: Verifies the user can change the selected language option in the download dialog before generating the download.
category: Download Features (Response Sheet / Answer Key / Quiz Mode)

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration option from the exam type/config dropdown
Click the Analyze or Generate Scorecard button
Click the Download button for "Answer Key"

title: Download language dialog can be dismissed without generating
description: Verifies the user can close the download language dialog and return to the results view without starting a download.
category: Download Features (Response Sheet / Answer Key / Quiz Mode)

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet HTML URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration option from the exam type/config dropdown
Click the Analyze or Generate Scorecard button
Click the Download button for "Response Sheet"
Verify text "Download Language" is not visible

title: Filter questions by Part and Status, then search within filtered results
description: Verifies that Part filter + Status filter narrow the list and search further refines the visible questions.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Part A" from the Part filter dropdown
Select "Wrong" from the Status filter dropdown

title: Search by question number after applying Part and Status filters
description: Verifies that searching by a question number works when filters are already applied.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Part A" from the Part filter dropdown
Select "Wrong" from the Status filter dropdown
Type "1" into the question search input field

title: Search by keyword after applying Part and Status filters
description: Verifies that searching by a keyword narrows down the filtered question list to matching items.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Part A" from the Part filter dropdown
Select "Wrong" from the Status filter dropdown
Type "capital" into the question search input field

title: Clear search input restores the filtered list (filters remain applied)
description: Verifies that removing the search term returns to the Part/Status-filtered list without clearing filters.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Part A" from the Part filter dropdown
Select "Wrong" from the Status filter dropdown
Type "capital" into the question search input field
Clear the question search input field

title: Apply filters that yield zero results and verify empty state appears
description: Verifies that an empty state is shown when the chosen filters/search yield no questions, with guidance text visible.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Part A" from the Part filter dropdown
Select "Bonus" from the Status filter dropdown

title: Use Clear Filters from empty state to restore the full question list
description: Verifies that Clear Filters resets filters and repopulates the question list after a zero-result state.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Part A" from the Part filter dropdown
Select "Bonus" from the Status filter dropdown

title: Language filter changes the displayed language of question content
description: Verifies that selecting a different language updates visible question text language presentation.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Hindi" from the Language filter dropdown
Select "English" from the Language filter dropdown

title: Status filter toggling between Correct, Wrong, and Unattempted updates the list each time
description: Verifies that changing status filter repeatedly updates the question list without requiring re-analysis.

steps.description: Fill a valid response sheet URL into the response sheet URL input field
Select an exam configuration from the exam type/config dropdown
Click on the Analyze/Generate Scorecard button
Select "Correct" from the Status filter dropdown
Select "Wrong" from the Status filter dropdown

title: Analyze valid URL shows loading screen and transitions to results
description: Verifies that starting analysis displays the loading screen with progress indicators and then transitions to the results view on success.

steps.description: Verify page title contains "CGL Score Sight"
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Loading screen appears immediately after clicking Analyze
description: Verifies the loading screen appears promptly after analysis starts so the user gets immediate feedback.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1" into the response sheet URL field

title: Loading screen shows multiple progress states/messages during analysis
description: Verifies that the loading experience includes visible progress indicators/messages rather than a blank spinner only.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Loading screen prevents re-triggering analysis while in progress
description: Verifies that while loading is active, the user cannot accidentally start a second analysis from the same screen.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1" into the response sheet URL field

title: Timeout prompt appears when parsing exceeds timeout/hangs
description: Verifies that when analysis does not complete, a timeout prompt is shown with Retry and Cancel options.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/unresponsive-response-sheet" into the response sheet URL field

title: Retry from timeout prompt restarts loading progress
description: Verifies that clicking Retry from the timeout prompt returns to an active loading state with progress indicators.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/unresponsive-response-sheet" into the response sheet URL field

title: Cancel from timeout prompt returns user to the input screen
description: Verifies that clicking Cancel dismisses the loading/timeout state and returns to the main input UI.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/unresponsive-response-sheet" into the response sheet URL field
Verify element "response sheet URL field" is visible

title: Loading screen fully disappears after successful transition to results
description: Verifies that after analysis completes, the loading screen is no longer visible and results are shown cleanly.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Analyze valid response sheet URL and display extracted candidate information
description: Verifies that analyzing a valid response sheet URL shows a CandidateInfoCard populated with extracted candidate details.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?test=valid" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Extracted candidate fields are not shown as Unknown for a valid URL
description: Verifies that for a valid response sheet URL, key candidate fields are populated and not displayed as Unknown placeholders.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1?test=valid" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Missing or unusual candidate table shows Unknown placeholders with parse warning
description: Verifies that when candidate fields cannot be extracted, the UI shows Unknown placeholders and a parse warning.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?test=missingCandidateTable" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Candidate info card still renders when only some fields are extractable
description: Verifies partial extraction behavior: some fields show values while missing ones show Unknown without breaking the CandidateInfoCard layout.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?test=partialCandidateFields" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Candidate extraction supports different exam page variants (ViewCandResponse vs AssessmentQPHTMLMode1)
description: Verifies candidate info extraction works when the response sheet is from a different supported page variant.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1?test=variantCandidateTable" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Invalid URL format is handled without showing CandidateInfoCard
description: Verifies that an obviously invalid URL entry prevents successful analysis and does not display candidate info results.

steps.description: Type "not a url" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Empty URL input shows a validation message and does not run analysis
description: Verifies that clicking Analyze with an empty URL shows a visible validation message and does not display candidate info.

title: CandidateInfoCard displays all expected labels for extracted fields
description: Verifies that CandidateInfoCard includes visible labels for all candidate fields (even if values may vary).

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?test=valid" into the response sheet URL input field

title: Compute and display total score and section breakdown after analysis
description: Verifies that after analyzing a valid response sheet URL with a selected exam config, the app shows Total Score and a visible section breakdown.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field

title: Question-level scoring indicators appear alongside totals
description: Verifies that question-level results (e.g., correct/wrong/unattempted) are visible and align with scoring presentation after analysis.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown
Type "https://example.com/AssessmentQPHTMLMode1" into the response sheet URL field

title: Section totals show counts including unattempted and bonus (if present)
description: Verifies that the section breakdown includes count fields for correct, wrong, unattempted, and bonus when the analyzed sheet contains them.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?case=bonus" into the response sheet URL field

title: Qualifying section is flagged and excluded from total (when applicable)
description: Verifies that when a qualifying section exists per selected config, the UI flags it and indicates exclusion from total scoring.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option that includes a qualifying section from the exam config dropdown
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?case=qualifying" into the response sheet URL field

title: Exam config mismatch or warning message is shown and user can review config
description: Verifies that when the selected exam config does not match the analyzed content expectations, the app shows a warning and allows review of the exam config selection.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse?case=config-mismatch" into the response sheet URL field
Click on the exam config dropdown
Verify element "Exam config options list" is visible

title: Changing exam config and re-analyzing updates displayed totals
description: Verifies that selecting a different exam config and running analysis again results in updated score totals being shown on the page.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown
Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field
Select a different exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown

title: Empty or missing URL prevents scoring and shows validation feedback
description: Verifies that attempting to analyze without a response sheet URL does not proceed to scoring output and shows visible validation feedback.

steps.description: Select an exam configuration option from the exam config dropdown
Verify text "Total Score" is not visible
Verify text "Section Breakdown" is not visible

title: Selecting no exam config prevents scoring and prompts user to choose config
description: Verifies that if the user provides a URL but does not select an exam config, the app blocks scoring and shows a visible prompt to select exam type/config.

steps.description: Type "https://example.com/ViewCandResponse" into the response sheet URL field
Verify text "Total Score" is not visible
Verify text "Section Breakdown" is not visible
